A frontend dashboard interface that displays financial data from multiple companies
Backend API endpoints to fetch financial data from an external PostgreSQL database
User authentication and authorization to access the multi-company dashboard
Company selection interface allowing users to switch between different company views
Consolidated financial reports view aggregating data across all selected companies
Cross-company comparison charts and tables for financial metrics
Financial data browsing by company with filtering and sorting capabilities
Real-time updates of financial data through dynamic API calls
Teal-themed UI components styled consistently throughout the application
Mint cream background color applied across all dashboard pages
Interactive reporting tools enabling users to generate custom financial reports
Data visualization components such as graphs, charts, and summary cards
Responsive layout ensuring usability on desktop and mobile devices
Configuration in package.json for `npm run install:all` to install frontend and backend dependencies
Configuration in package.json for `npm run dev` to start both frontend and backend concurrently
